ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains cross-track ion drift velocities obtained at 250ms resolution from the DE 2 Ion Drift Meter (IDM). Data are available in ASCII from nssdcftp and in CDF format from CDAWeb (as well as CDAWeb plots and lists).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IDM Principal Investigator, Dr. R.A. Heelis

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb FTP area
AccessURL.Description: For ftp retrieval of daily CDF files

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HTTP area
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IDM Principal Investigator, Dr. R.A. Heelis, and the Space Physics Data Facility at NASA/GSFC

AccessURL.Name: SPDF ASCII ftp area
AccessURL.Description: For ftp retrieval of one-orbit ASCII files

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: For CDAWeb subset, plot and list capabilities

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IDM Principal Investigator, Dr. R.A. Heelis, and the Space Physics Data Facility at NASA/GSFC
